ygData.msgSnippet: ... on much Mana, (which lifetap does), then perhaps this would be the way to go. But, I really dont think lifetaps are going to help the SK class much at all,
ygData.messageBody:
> Ahh, this would be true as well. If the power given to the SK class relied
on much Mana, (which lifetap does), then perhaps this would be the way to
go. But, I really dont think lifetaps are going to help the SK class much at
all, except for cutting down down time at lower levels...
Perhaps we should focus on mana dependent change rather than an item
change... Mana is one thing the small races might have going for them moreso
than the large races..

Morgul the Black


>
> Lifetap helps Human/DE more because they have more mana. And Trolls
> have regen so they don't need it as much. As it stands, it's hard to
> run out of mana, even when constantly fighting.
>
> (In a group recently, the enchanter claritied me! lol! Talk about
> too much mana)
>
> Xilith
